name: Space FPS
description:
The spaceship has been invaded by aliens.

Shoot em up!

Clean the artificial gravity module. This part of the base is a huge rotating toroid. 

You have to fight against monsters.

The ray gun, controlled by the left click, works only in close combat. You can launch powerful rockets with the right click. Be careful when using this weapon.

For the best experience try the downloadable version for Windows.
